00059 void DATFileReaderTest::ReadDATWithGenericReaderTest()
00060 {
00061         GenericFileReader reader;
00062         GenericData data;
00063 
00064         reader.SetFilename("../data/DAT_file");
00065         reader.ReadHeader(data);
00066 
00067         int dataGroups = data.DataGroupCnt();
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataGroups == 1);
00069 
00070         int dataSets = data.DataSetCnt(0);
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataSets == 2);
00072 
00073         affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* pixels = data.DataSet(0, 0);
00074         if(pixels->Open())
00075         {
00076                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00077                 int r = pixels->Rows();
00078                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r == 10);
00079                 int c = pixels->Cols();
00080                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(c == 1);
00081                 int16_t pix1;
00082                 pixels->GetData(0, 0, pix1);
00083                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(pix1 == 36);
00084                 int16_t pix2;
00085                 pixels->GetData(1, 0, pix2);
00086                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(pix2 == 3);
00087         }
00088         else
00089         {
00090                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0);
00091         }
00092         pixels->Delete();
00093 
00094         affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* stats = data.DataSet(0, 1);
00095         if(stats->Open())
00096         {
00097                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00098                 int r = stats->Rows();
00099                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r == 1);
00100                 int c = stats->Cols();
00101                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(c == 2);
00102                 int16_t s1;
00103                 stats->GetData(0, 0, s1);
00104                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s1 == 16);
00105                 int16_t s2;
00106                 stats->GetData(0, 1, s2);
00107                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s2 == 22);
00108         }
00109         else
00110         {
00111                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0);
00112         }
00113         stats->Delete();
00114 }

00116 void DATFileReaderTest::ReadSmallDATFileTest()
00117 {
00118         DATData data;
00119         DATFileReader reader;
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(SMALL_DAT_FILE));
00121         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00122 
00123         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == SMALL_DAT_FILE);
00124         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == 4);
00125         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetCols() == 5);
00126         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetArrayType() == L"Hg-small");
00127         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetPixelSize() == 0.71f);
00128         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetScannerType() == L"M10");
00129         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetScannerID() == L"main");
00130         DateTime dt = data.GetScanDate();
00131         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt.ToString() == L"12-25-05T11:12:13Z");
00132 
00133         u_int32_t pixelCnt = data.GetRows()*data.GetCols();
00134         u_int16_t* expectedPixels = new u_int16_t[pixelCnt];
00135         for (u_int16_t i=0; i<pixelCnt; ++i)
00136                 expectedPixels[i] = i+10;
00137 
00138         u_int16_t* pixels = new u_int16_t[pixelCnt];
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetPixels(pixels, 0, data.GetRows()));
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(expectedPixels, pixels, sizeof(u_int16_t)*data.GetRows()*data.GetCols()) == 0);
00141 
00142         u_int16_t min, max;
00143         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRange(min, max));
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(min == pixels[0]);
00145         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(max == pixels[pixelCnt-1]);
00146 
00147         delete [] expectedPixels;
00148         delete [] pixels;
00149 }
00150 
00151 void DATFileReaderTest::ReadSmallDATFileWithSubgridsTest()
00152 {
00153         DATData data;
00154         DATFileReader reader;
00155         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(SMALL_DAT_FILE_WITH_SUBGRIDS));
00156         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00157 
00158         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == SMALL_DAT_FILE_WITH_SUBGRIDS);
00159         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == 4);
00160         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetCols() == 5);
00161         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetArrayType() == L"Hg-small");
00162         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetPixelSize() == 0.71f);
00163         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetScannerType() == L"M10");
00164         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetScannerID() == L"main");
00165         DateTime dt = data.GetScanDate();
00166         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt.ToString() == L"12-25-05T11:12:13Z");
00167 
00168         u_int32_t pixelCnt = data.GetRows()*data.GetCols();
00169         u_int16_t* expectedPixels = new u_int16_t[pixelCnt];
00170         for (u_int16_t i=0; i<pixelCnt; ++i)
00171                 expectedPixels[i] = i+10;
00172 
00173         u_int16_t* pixels = new u_int16_t[pixelCnt];
00174         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetPixels(pixels, 0, data.GetRows()));
00175         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(expectedPixels, pixels, sizeof(u_int16_t)*data.GetRows()*data.GetCols()) == 0);
00176 
00177         u_int16_t min, max;
00178         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRange(min, max));
00179         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(min == pixels[0]);
00180         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(max == pixels[pixelCnt-1]);
00181 
00182         delete [] expectedPixels;
00183         delete [] pixels;
00184 
00185         // Compute the expected grid
00186         float increment = 2.5f;
00187         FRegion ggRegion;
00188         float ptVal = 0.0;
00189         for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00190         {
00191                 FPoint point;
00192                 point.x = ptVal;
00193                 ptVal += increment;
00194                 point.y = ptVal;
00195                 ggRegion.pts.push_back(point);
00196         }
00197         u_int32_t ggStatus = DATData::GridOK | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
00198 
00199         // Check the grid
00200         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetGlobalGrid() == ggRegion);
00201         // Check the status
00202         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetGlobalGridStatus() == ggStatus);
00203 
00204         int32_t subgridCnt = 10;
00205 
00206         // Compute the expected subgrids
00207         for(int n = 0; n < subgridCnt; n++)
00208         {
00209                 FRegion expectedSGRegion;
00210                 float ptVal = 0.0f + (float)n;
00211                 for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00212                 {
00213                         FPoint point;
00214                         point.x = ptVal;
00215                         ptVal += increment;
00216                         point.y = ptVal;
00217                         expectedSGRegion.pts.push_back(point);
00218                 }
00219 
00220                 u_int32_t sgStatus = DATData::GridError | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
00221                 if (n % 2 == 0)
00222                         sgStatus = DATData::GridOK | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
00223 
00224                 FRegion sgRegion = data.GetSubgrid(n);
00225 
00226                 // Check the subgrid
00227                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(sgRegion == expectedSGRegion);
00228                 // Check the status
00229                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(sgStatus == data.GetSubgridStatus(n));
00230         }
00231 
00232 }

00234 void DATFileReaderTest::ReadSmallDATFileWithSubgridsUsingSmallMemoryFootprintTest()
00235 {
00236         DATData data;
00237         DATFileReader reader;
00238         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(SMALL_DAT_FILE_WITH_SUBGRIDS));
00239         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00240 
00241         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == SMALL_DAT_FILE_WITH_SUBGRIDS);
00242         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == 4);
00243         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetCols() == 5);
00244         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetArrayType() == L"Hg-small");
00245         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetPixelSize() == 0.71f);
00246         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetScannerType() == L"M10");
00247         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetScannerID() == L"main");
00248         DateTime dt = data.GetScanDate();
00249         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt.ToString() == L"12-25-05T11:12:13Z");
00250 
00251         // Compute the expected results for the full image
00252         u_int32_t fullImagePixelCnt = data.GetRows()*data.GetCols();
00253         u_int16_t* expectedPixelsForFullImage = new u_int16_t[fullImagePixelCnt];
00254         for (u_int16_t i=0; i<fullImagePixelCnt; ++i)
00255                 expectedPixelsForFullImage[i] = i+10;
00256 
00257         // Copy a 2 by 3 region of the expected results.
00258         u_int16_t i=0;
00259         u_int32_t pixelCnt = 2 * 3; // rows * cols
00260         u_int16_t* expectedPixels = new u_int16_t[pixelCnt];
00261         for (u_int16_t irow = 1; irow < 3; ++irow)
00262                 for (u_int16_t icol = 2; icol < 5; ++icol, ++i)
00263                         expectedPixels[i] = expectedPixelsForFullImage[irow*data.GetCols() + icol];
00264 
00265         // Retrieve a 2 by 3 region of the 4 by 5 image
00266         u_int16_t* pixels = new u_int16_t[pixelCnt];
00267         data.GetPixels(pixels, 1, 2, 2, 3);
00268         //CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetPixels(pixels, 1, 2, 2, 3));
00269         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(expectedPixels, pixels, sizeof(u_int16_t)*pixelCnt) == 0);
00270 
00271         u_int16_t min, max;
00272         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRange(min, max));
00273         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(min == expectedPixelsForFullImage[0]);
00274         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(max == expectedPixelsForFullImage[fullImagePixelCnt-1]);
00275 
00276         delete [] expectedPixelsForFullImage;
00277         delete [] expectedPixels;
00278         delete [] pixels;
00279 
00280         // Compute the expected grid
00281         float increment = 2.5f;
00282         FRegion ggRegion;
00283         float ptVal = 0.0;
00284         for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00285         {
00286                 FPoint point;
00287                 point.x = ptVal;
00288                 ptVal += increment;
00289                 point.y = ptVal;
00290                 ggRegion.pts.push_back(point);
00291         }
00292         u_int32_t ggStatus = DATData::GridOK | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
00293 
00294         // Check the grid
00295         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetGlobalGrid() == ggRegion);
00296         // Check the status
00297         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetGlobalGridStatus() == ggStatus);
00298 
00299         int32_t subgridCnt = 10;
00300 
00301         // Compute the expected subgrids
00302         for(int n = 0; n < subgridCnt; n++)
00303         {
00304                 FRegion expectedSGRegion;
00305                 float ptVal = 0.0f + (float)n;
00306                 for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00307                 {
00308                         FPoint point;
00309                         point.x = ptVal;
00310                         ptVal += increment;
00311                         point.y = ptVal;
00312                         expectedSGRegion.pts.push_back(point);
00313                 }
00314 
00315                 u_int32_t sgStatus = DATData::GridError | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
00316                 if (n % 2 == 0)
00317                         sgStatus = DATData::GridOK | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
00318 
00319                 FRegion sgRegion = data.GetSubgrid(n);
00320 
00321                 // Check the subgrid
00322                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(sgRegion == expectedSGRegion);
00323                 // Check the status
00324                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(sgStatus == data.GetSubgridStatus(n));
00325         }
00326 }

00328 void DATFileReaderTest::ReadSmallDATFileWithGridParametersTest()
00329 {
00330         DATData data;
00331         DATFileReader reader;
00332         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(SMALL_DAT_FILE_WITH_SUBGRIDS_AND_PARAMETERS));
00333         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00334 
00335         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == SMALL_DAT_FILE_WITH_SUBGRIDS_AND_PARAMETERS);
00336         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == 4);
00337         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetCols() == 5);
00338 
00339         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00340         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params;
00341         data.GetGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters(params);
00342         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 2);
00343         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.FindGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(L"County", nvt));
00344         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetValueText() == L"Santa Clara");
00345         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params[0].GetName() == L"Zip Code");
00346         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params[0].GetValueInt32() == 95051);
00347 }
